description:
Mike found himself again needing more money, and hit me up for more last minute work.
Mike said, "Just make sure the dude doesn't have a big dick, ok?"
Suuuure!
Wade had just done his solo and was willing and able to break in a straight guy. So he was there in Mike's time of "need". Unfortunately Wade's unit is not exactly small.
This is reality here guys. Mike really struggled with getting topped, and it took a lot of patience from Wade to not just start fucking him at a fast pace. Lots of slow grinding goin' on here as Mike gets broke in.
Thankfully Wade started hitting his sweet spot, and Mike was bewildered when his dick stayed hard, and he actually busted while being fucked.
This concludes the end of Mike's formal education. What next?
title: Mike North & Wade - Wrapped
